import { AuthService } from './../service/auth.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { check:boolean = false; constructor(private AuthService:AuthService){} ngOnInit() { this.check = this.AuthService.isLoggedIn(); } }
